pr_title: Constraint verfier naming + API/impl split off

timeline.bodyText: This is the main reason why penalizesBy(int) can't use overloading for penalizesBy(long).
timeline.author: ge0ffrey

timeline.message:
ConstraintVerifier: naming + API vs impl

ConstraintVerifier: simplify generics

ConstraintVerifier: split API and impl

ConstraintVerifier: public method naming changes (controversial)

ConstraintVerifier: revert back to rewardsWith and penalizesBy, but auto-cast int to long
